oneOf.description: Types that do not need additional parameters.

ConsistentRead.title: ConsistentRead
ConsistentRead.description: If your application requires a strongly consistent read, set consistentRead to true. Although a strongly consistent read might take more time than an eventually consistent read, it always returns the last updated value.

IncludeVectors.title: IncludeVectors
IncludeVectors.description: If your application need to include vector values in the response, set includeVectors to true.
